scripts.test: npm --prefix ../../../ddns-core run build && tsc -p tsconfig.json && rm -rf dist/ddns-core && mkdir -p dist/ddns-core/dist && cp -R ../../../ddns-core/dist/* dist/ddns-core/ && cp -R ../../../ddns-core/dist/* dist/ddns-core/dist/ && node dist/services/control-plane/credits-coordinator/src/tests/credits.test.js && node dist/services/control-plane/credits-coordinator/src/tests/passport.test.js && node dist/services/control-plane/credits-coordinator/src/tests/comments.test.js
